description:
Your own slice of paradise! This homely, & welcoming property is sure to impress and instantly feel like "the one". A fantastic opportunity to have it all... huge block, privacy, lovely home, picturesque backyard outlook, a large outdoor patio entertaining space, a teenagers retreat or home office dwelling, side access and 5 car port spaces. This property provides the family dream for those who want the country lifestyle away from all the noise, with easy accessibility to town.

Sitting on a beautiful and very usable 3,103m2 block. Whether you are looking for a peaceful and private lifestyle, endless parking space for caravans/boats or a potential to create a home-based business, this property is for you.

The quaint low set home is ready to go, has been freshly painted and provides plenty of living space for the family.

Heading inside you're first greeted by the living room. This space includes a ceiling fan and a split system air conditioner, ensuring comfort on those hot QLD days & nights. Connecting is the 4th bedroom or study.

Continuing through you will find the 3 bedrooms. The master room includes double built in wardrobes, a ceiling fan and a box air-conditioner. The second and third bedrooms both include built in wardrobes and ceiling fans. Next is the main bathroom which features a built in double door linen cupboard, spacious vanity with plenty of drawer & cupboard space and a shower with a large rainfall showerhead. The separate laundry room is adjacent, including a single linen cupboard and door straight to the outdoor patio.

The kitchen is the hub of every home and this one will surely impress the chef in the family. It offers an abundance of cupboard & bench space, stainless steel appliances, stunning tile splashbacks surrounding, bread box nook, good sized fridge space and a view out to your fantastic piece of tranquillity. Opening off the kitchen is the dining room which leads directly out to the huge patio, giving the ability to combine your indoor and outdoor space as one.

The expansive patio provides multitudes of space to set up your dream entertaining area. Read a book & relax, enjoying the lovely views whilst the kids create endless memories running around the huge backyard.

Next is the separate dwelling, a great teenagers retreat, home office, salon or studio! It comprises two rooms, a split system air-conditioner and a vanity/sink area.

Enjoy an abundance of parking space with 5 carport parks, two with a concreted floor. Not to forget the massive caravan/trailer port... the height clearance is impressive to say the least.

The fully fenced property is lined with garden beds and tropical trees, providing a private retreat for you and your family. Looking out from the patio this property really feels like a permanent private retreat, all to yourself!

Property features:
- Prime realestate - 3103m2 in popular estate
- Great location - minutes from shops, public transport, schools
- Brick and tile home
- 3 generous size bedrooms (including built-in robes)
- Gorgeous street frontage and privacy from the road
- Modern Kitchen (fitted with electric appliances)
- Separate Lounge room
- Split system Air-conditioning
- Huge outdoor entertaining area
- Ceiling fans through-out
- Electric gate
- Carports galore
- Garden sheds
- Water tank
- Additional teenagers retreat/home office/studio (with split system aircon)
- Side access

This amazing lifestyle property is a dream. To view and start your future memories, call Kathy or Will today on: 0427 374 117
